column3: “I reeeally don't dig the taste and scent of this strain, but then again I don't like coffee! The high, though, is great--very clear head, very heavy body. I then did transition into more of a heady high, though, which was a bit odd but I dug it anyway!”

“Black Bubba has a different aroma. It has a very mild coffee scent with a curious smell my nose can't quite pick out. We smoked it out of a bong. It has a very relaxed and  smooth hit. I was surprised at how calm it was inhaled. The effects of this strain include an intense cerebral high combined with a mild body high.”
“Super sedative, great for sleep and restless legs. The flavor isn't my favorite but it's not offensive.”

“Black Bubba has a different aroma. It has a very mild coffee scent with a curious smell my nose can't quite pick out. We smoked it out of a bong. It has a very relaxed and  smooth hit. I was surprised at how calm it was inhaled. The effects of this strain include an intense cerebral high combined with a mild body high.”
“This strain is a powerful indica strain that as soon as you smoke it it goes straight to your head. Definitely a happy relaxing high”
“This was the strain that introduced me to weed lmao what a throwback.”

“Perfect sleepy weed.  Your body will melt into the couch or bed.  I smoked a few bong rips of this the other night before bed, and I was out for the count.  Super heavy indica.  Don’t smoke this when you have plans to be productive.”
“I really like this strain. I have a stress induced seizure disorder and it just made all the stress melt away.”
“Good strain good high but I found a seed but over all mellow high.”

“I had Black Bubba in Cali, yrs ago, (about 10 yrs) maybe more! It was awesome!
I kept the tag with the name in case I ran across it again!!  I have one other tag  saved, named, Alaskan Thunder Fuck!!!
YUMM”
“As far as i can tell, this pot will totally unhinge everybody you smoke it with.”
“MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE 😍😍😍👌🔥👍💣. The Bubble Gum flavor mixes well with the citrus blends. unbelievable nugs too 10 out of 10”

“Definitely has a smell like another strain, industrial plant, both very earthy" with a slight blue cheese hint on the back. Taste almost of a piney dirt. Now the high... Great! All body with a little dizzy feeling for a bit then definitely gives you a bit of head high. Would "highly" recommend”"
“Actually tastes like a white Russian. calm, focused, and relaxed.”
“Great strain.  Gave me a really relaxed tingly feeling and slowed my brain down.  Great for sleep.”
“1 gram at AMCH in Denver cost a pot tourist $16.50 summer of 2015. Well worth it. I tasted sandalwood and anise. I LMFAO.”
